en.title: [2024] Sabah Yearbook
en.description: Annual compilation of key data for Sabah, including its population, economy, education, and health.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest annual Sabah Yearbook, presenting a compilation of key statistics for Sabah, including its population, economy, education, and health.

bm.title: [2024] Buku Tahunan Sabah
bm.description: Kompilasi tahunan data penting bagi Sabah, termasuk penduduk, ekonomi, pendidikan, dan kesihatan.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan Buku Tahunan Sabah terkini, iaitu kompilasi data penting untuk Sabah, termasuk penduduk, ekonomi, pendidikan, dan kesihatan.
